title: Rosemary Sage Candle | Scented Candle for Home | Highly Scented & Long Lasting Coconut Wax Luxury Candle | Medium
features: HIGHLY SCENTED: Customers rave about how well the scent fills their home with a delightful aroma that’s not overpowering.
LONG LASTING: The medium size burns for 25+ hours. The large size burns for 35+ hours. The dreamy scent lingers long after the candle is blown out.
PREMIUM FRAGRANCE BLEND: Top notes of pine & eucalyptus. Middle notes of rosemary & green floral. Base notes of sage & cedar.

CLEAN SCENTS: The safest, highest quality & most thoroughly tested fragrances in the industry. These scents exclude potentially hazardous chemicals that are present in other candle fragrances, producing safer candles you can enjoy with confidence.
ECO-FRIENDLY COCONUT WAX BLEND: Made primarily of coconut wax, a sustainable resource. Burns slowly, cleanly & evenly, with a bright white finish.
description: Liven up your home with this earthy yet bright fragrance full of fresh botanical aromas. Infused with natural essential oils, including fir needle, eucalyptus, orange & cedar leaf. The matte white glass with natural wood lid provides an elegant look that matches any decor. Available in medium (6-oz. jar, 4.5 oz. net wt.) and large (10-oz. jar, 6.8 oz. net wt).
